messages.subject: [SHQ] Re: DVD Sale
messages.msgSnippet: Oooh...DVD sale! This sounds like a great opportunity to catch some J-flicks I haven t seen yet, including Twilight Samurai (shame on me, I know! :P). Has
messages.messageBody:
Oooh...DVD sale! This sounds like a great opportunity
to catch some J-flicks I haven't seen yet, including
Twilight Samurai (shame on me, I know! :P).

Has anyone ordered from kurotokagi.com before? Are
they reliable?


--- Ai

messages.subject: Re: DVD Sale
messages.msgSnippet: ... Under the Samurai Category 13 ASSASSINS Receiving a confidential order from a senior executive of the Tokugawa shogunate, 13 samurai warriors set about
messages.messageBody:
> http://www.kurotokagi.com/

Under the "Samurai" Category

13 ASSASSINS
Receiving a confidential order from a senior executive of the
Tokugawa
shogunate, 13 samurai warriors set about plotting to assassinate
Matsudaira Nariaki, chief of the Akashi feudal clan who is
extraordinarily cruel and lewd.

*I'm wondering how they'll work in the "lewd" part (0_o)

ARAGAMI
This one I've seen....All out non-stop action!!!!
Recommended for those who just want gratuitous violence

ASSASSINATION
About Kiyokawa Hachiro...from Shiba Ryotaro

HEAVEN AND EARTH
This one I've also seen...well chorographed big battlefield scenes
maybe that's the problem *too well choreographed...Takeda Shingen

ILLUSION OF BLOOD
I liked this film...warning no swordplay...but a quick introduction
to the YOTSUYA KAIDAN story *SPOOOKY****

don't forget Twilight Samurai and Zatoichi!

messages.subject: DVD Sale
messages.msgSnippet: Anyone with a few extra $$ in theri pocket should toddle over to http://www.kurotokagi.com/ Where most everything is on sale for $10 including When the Last
messages.messageBody:
Anyone with a few extra $$ in theri pocket should toddle over to

http://www.kurotokagi.com/

Where most everything is on sale for $10 including When the Last Sword
is Drawn/Mibu Gishi Den

There are also quite a few non samurai films featuring some of our
favorite "Shinsengumi actors" like Jo Odagiri, Shosuke Tanihara,
Tatsuya Fujiwara and even Gohatto's creepy Kano-- Ryuhei Matsuda.

I highly recommend Sky High, Makai Tensho, 1/47-Chushingura and Battle
Royale #1

If you have a lot of extra $$$ you can even pick up the entire NHK
Shinsengumi series for $120.

Barb Sheridan
